description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Balloon Princess needs your help. An evil lord has exiled her from the Balloon Kingdom and has sent the sinister Balloon Agents to stop her return. Help her avoid Balloon Agents and return her safely to the Balloon Kingdom!  Balloon Guard is a platformer with a twist. While conquering various platforming challenges, you must also bounce the Balloon Princess along while keeping her safe.
description.short: The Balloon Princess needs your help. An evil lord has exiled her from the Balloon Kingdom and has sent the sinister Balloon Agents to stop her return. Help her avoid Balloon Agents and return her safely to the Balloon Kingdom!  Balloon Guard is a platformer with a twist. While conquering various platforming challenges, you must also bounce the Balloon Princess along while keeping her safe.
